Member Function Documentation

virtual const Bitmap& sgfx::Font::bitmap ( ) const
pure virtual

Accesses the bitmap used to draw characters.

Implemented in sgfx::FontMemory.

u16 sgfx::Font::bits_per_pixel ( ) const
inline

Accesses the number of bits per pixel in the font.

int sgfx::Font::calc_len ( const char *  str) const

Calculates the length (pixels on x-axis) of the specified string.

static const char* sgfx::Font::charset ( )
static

Returns a string of the available character set

int sgfx::Font::draw_char ( char  c,
Bitmap &  dest,
sg_point_t  point 
) const

Draws a character on the bitmap.

Parameters
cThe character to draw
destThe destination bitmap
pointThe top-left corner where to draw on dest
Returns
Zero on success (-1 if character fails to load)
int sgfx::Font::draw_str ( const char *  str,
Bitmap &  dest,
sg_point_t  point 
) const

Draws the string on the specified bitmap.

Parameters
strThe string to draw (or set)
destThe bitmap to draw the string on
pointThe top left corner to start drawing the string
Returns
Zero on success
virtual sg_size_t sgfx::Font::get_height ( ) const
pure virtual

Returns the maximum height of any character in the font.

Implemented in sgfx::FontMemory.

virtual sg_size_t sgfx::Font::get_width ( ) const
pure virtual

Returns the maximum width of any character in the font.

Implemented in sgfx::FontMemory.

u16 sgfx::Font::kerning_pairs ( ) const
inline

Accesses the number of kerning pairs in the font.

sg_size_t sgfx::Font::letter_spacing ( ) const
inline

Returns the spacing of the letters within a word

u16 sgfx::Font::num_chars ( ) const
inline

Accesses the number of characters in the font.

void sgfx::Font::set_letter_spacing ( sg_size_t  spacing)
inline

Sets the spacing between letters within a word.

void sgfx::Font::set_space_size ( int  s)
inline

Sets the number of pixels in a space between words.

int sgfx::Font::size ( ) const
inline

Returns the number of characters in the font.

int sgfx::Font::space_size ( ) const
inline

Returns the number of pixels between words.
